CHANGELOG.md: All notable changes to the Vault Search Pro extension will be documented in this file.
The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
CONTRIBUTING.md: First off, thank you for considering contributing to Vault Search Pro! It's people like you that make this extension better for everyone.
LICENSE: Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
PRODUCTION_READY_SUMMARY.md: # ğŸ‰ Vault Search Pro - Production Ready Summary

Your Chrome extension has been successfully upgraded to a **production-grade, enterprise-ready** solution! The extension has been transformed from version 1.3.0 to **version 2.0.0** with significant enhancements.
QUICKSTART.md: Get up and running with Vault Search Pro in 5 minutes!
README.md: > **Production-grade Chrome extension for blazing-fast HashiCorp Vault secret search**
A powerful, enterprise-ready Chrome extension that provides lightning-fast search capabilities for HashiCorp Vault with multi-auth support, intelligent path scanning, and deep value search.
background.js: * Vault Search Extension - Background Service Worker
* Handles authentication state management, token storage, and message passing
content.js: * Provides blazing-fast path-first search for HashiCorp Vault with deep value scanning
